abstract: YouTube has given its home page and Web site the biggest redesign in its history. It hopes the site will help people find the videos they want to watch, let video creators connect with viewers and, ultimately, make YouTube a competitor to cable TV with millions of channels that can be seen on screens of any size.
snippet: YouTube has given its home page and Web site the biggest redesign in its history. It hopes the site will help people find the videos they want to watch, let video creators connect with viewers and, ultimately, make YouTube a competitor to cable TV...
lead_paragraph: YouTube, though one of the most popular sites on the Web, has always been a bit overwhelming, with its avalanche of videos, more than 48 hours of which are uploaded each minute.

headline.main: YouTube Redesigns Its Web Site to Promote Personalized Video Channels
